text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityNameUse where concept descends from _OrganizationNameUse
  • Import all the codes that are contained in AddressRepresentationUse

name: OrganizationNameUse
title: OrganizationNameUse
